snippet.title: Magnitude 6.0 quake hits Philippines
snippet.content:
SIMON BENSON
A dramatic security clampdown will be imposed at domestic airport terminals, similar to those for international flights.
PAUL MALEY
During the height of the Syrian war, a senior IS fighter sent a text message to his brother in Australia.
GREG BROWN
A former senior AMA official has lashed out at the medical body's campaign for same-sex marriage, accusing it of using false information.
PRIMROSE RIORDAN
If Turnbull were ousted as PM, Dutton would not stand aside for Abbott or Bishop, a new chapter by Niki Savva says.
David Kilcullen
US troops are ready for a North Korean strike. With the continental US itself under -direct threat, there may be no other option.
Chris Kenny
Malcolm Turnbull needs a win to give his colleagues a star by which to navigate.
Janet Albrechtsen
The findings of a report into campus sexual assault shows overreach in hysteria about predatory males.
NICOLA BERKOVIC, ANDREW WHITE
Suburban Commonwealth Bank staff raised the alarm about the organisation's 'crazy' lack of security- measures.
